lead_paragraph: In Dakar and other cities, men stand on street corners with cages of birds known as pithis, which people buy and release to get rid of sins and anxiety.

headline.print_headline: Absolution, With a Wing and a Prayer
headline.main: In Senegal, Absolution Comes With a Wing and a Prayer

snippet: In Dakar and other cities, men stand on street corners with cages of birds known as pithis, which people buy and release to get rid of sins and anxiety....
